thread.title_full: Good stay in great location - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Baxter27_11
title: Good stay in great location - Review
text: Located in city of London excellent hotel. Good value for money hotel in great location. Tea and coffee and fridge in room. Good quality toiletries in bathroom. Slight delay checking in which we could have done without as it was after midnight and we were only there for one night.
